overview: Val (Alexia Anders) is back in her hometown and she's heading to her best friend Emily (Nikole Nash) for the weekend. Emily's controlling stepbrother Ethan (Michael Swayze) will also be there, which Val doesn't like since he's controlling. Later that night, Val wakes up from her dreams and finds Ethan under the covers with Emily and she tries to convince Val to join them. Dad named Ken (Steve Holmes) manipulates her stepdaughter Molly (Riley Star) into sex after her mom goes missing under mysterious circumstances. But his dark desire for his stepdaughter isn't the ONLY thing that Ken is hiding.
title: Middle of the Night
